title: In a season of big fat weddings hotels double up as planners
description: Hotels in India, including Shangri-La, Radisson, and Hyatt, are witnessing unprecedented wedding bookings this season. Properties are nearly sold out for key dates, with rates increasing by up to 25%. Unique offerings and services are being launched to cater to the growing popularity of destination weddings in locations such as Udaipur, Goa, and beyond.
